name: Bikini Season
description:
Content Warning: Eating disorders, anxiety, starvation.

Bikini Season is a satire of women's magazines, their underlying message, and also quizzes. It's made by a woman who both consumes such content and is disgusted by doing so.

It's funny sometimes and there's vomit!

Made for the #Resistjam.

This game shows the effect of teaching girls, through the media, to be a certain weight and look a certain way. It captures a little piece of American life rarely touched on by games, the *trendy girl* experience.
